we are here to celebrate compassion but

and so what I'd like to do this morning

you'll come with me on my basic premise
that words matter that they shape the

enduring in the medical context that it

when the going gets rough and the going
is pretty rough right now I think that
without perhaps being able to name it we

our only guiding
virtue compassion is a Worthy successor
it is organic across our religious

it transcends

to start simply I want to say that

it's linked to practical virtues like

in the face of a stranger in the face of

other I'm not sure if I could show you
